thread.title: Simeon Olotu

author: Simeon Olotu
title: Simeon Olotu
text:
i booked a flight with bravofly. Lagos to Calgary (with layovers at addis ababa and London Heathrow airport then transit to the London Gatwick airport for the flight to Calgary) operated by Ethiopian Airlines and WestJet. I've been able to confirm my bookings/Â­reservations for the Ethiopian airline flights from Lagos to Heathrow but I'm unable to confirm my booking/reservation for the WestJet flight from Gatwick to Calgary. It says we have no record of your reservation and this is causing me to panic. WS0002 March 4
Booking id 950189683
